Package bonusbot

Class Lang

  • java.lang.Object
    • bonusbot.Lang
  • public class Lang
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the language-strings for english, german and turkish.

    • Method Detail

      • getLang

        private static java.lang.String getLang​(java.lang.String str,
                                        java.lang.String language,
                                        java.lang.String... replaces)
        Get language-string for a specific language.
        Parameters:
        str - Identificator for the language-string.
        language - The language for which we want to get the text.
        replaces - Optional replacements for {1}, {2} etc.
        Returns:
        The language-text.

      • getLang

        public static java.lang.String getLang​(java.lang.String str,
                                       sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser user,
                                       sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild guild,
                                       java.lang.String... replaces)
        Get language-string for specific user in the specific guild. Also replace {1} with replace1
        Parameters:
        str - The index for the value.
        user - The user who will get the message (needed for checking the language)
        guild - Your guild where you want to send the message.
        replaces - The optional strings to replace {1}, {2} ...
        Returns:
        The string for the users language.

      • getLang

                                       java.lang.String... replaces)
        Get language-string in the default language.
        Parameters:
        str - Identificator for language string (key for map).
        replaces - Optional replacements for {1}, {2} etc.
        Returns:
        language-text
